alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:14AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Louis and Carlton Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, to near Cromwell, to near Barnum, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area around 1220 AM CDT. Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area around 1225 AM CDT. Cloquet, Scanlon, Carlton, Wrenshall, Thomson, Brookston and Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Saginaw, Proctor, Canyon, Pike Lake Near Duluth, Hermantown, City of Rice Lake, Island Lake and Boulder Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis
